XIV.8.4.b
.
Fugitive Felon Coordinators
Each RO is required to designate a Fugitive Felon Coordinator.Â  Fugitive Felon Coordinators serve as the local
POC with VA Central Office (CO) for fugitive felon issues, and
subject-matter expert on fugitive felon issues.
Notes
:
When a VSC/BEST designates a new employee to serve as its Fugitive Felon Coordinator, it must notify Compensation Service by sending an e-mail to
VAVBAWAS/CO/212
.
When a PMC designates a new employee to serve as its Fugitive Felon Coordinator, it must notify P&F Service by sending an e-mail to
VAVBAWAS/CO/P&F TNG QUAL OVRST
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 8 - Fugitive Felon Match
